[Version 1.0.5]
[01# get coins to have max]
04000000 0044B324 3B9AC9FF
04000000 0044B450 18FFF6A0

[02# get token to have max]
04000000 0044B324 3B9AC9FF
04000000 0044B558 18FFEE60

[03# get diamonds to have max]
04000000 0044B324 3B9AC9FF
04000000 0044B38C 18FFFCC0

[04# inf item usage]
04000000 0018DADC 110006E0

[inf item usage (OFF)]
04000000 0018DADC 4B0002E0

[05# Level up after fight]
04000000 004464E0 5284E1F7

[Level up after fight (Off)]
04000000 004464E0 2A0003F7

[06# Max Stamina]
04000000 00445D10 5284E1F5

[Max Stamina (Off)]
04000000 00445D10 2A0003F5

[07# Always Cosmic]
04000000 0024F07C 528000A0
04000000 0024F080 D503201F

[Always Cosmic off]
04000000 0024F07C 7100141F
04000000 0024F080 1A9F17E0

04000000 003A4840 D101C3FF

04000000 003E16C0 52800020

04000000 003E16C0 2A1F03E0

[10# Unlock warpstones]
04000000 001EE9F0 320003E0
